title: Koha ki te Orbital Temple
heading: Whakaotia To Koha
chooseHow: Whiriwhiria me pehea e hiahia ai koe ki te whakaoti i to koha tango taake:

option1.heading: Kōwhiringa 1: Koha Tuihono Inaianei
option1.description: Whakaotia tonu to koha ma te whakamahi i te kaari nama, te kaari nama, me etahi atu tikanga utu ipurangi na roto i ta maatau kaitautoko putea haumaru, The Field . Ka whiwhi koe i te rīhiti tāke inamata.

option2.heading: Kōwhiringa 2: Putea Putea ki Te Roy Foundation
option2.description: Hangaia he putea putea tika, whakawhiti waea ranei ki te Roy Foundation , to maatau hoa rautaki me te kaitautoko putea. He pai tenei whiringa mo nga koha nui, mo nga whakawhitinga o te ao.
option2.instructions: Whakaurua koa " Temepara Orbital - {donationType} " ki te mara tohutoro. I muri i te whakaotinga o to whakawhitinga, imeera mai ki a matou i sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art me o taipitopito whakawhiti kia whiwhi koe i to rihiti taake.
option2.button: Whakapa mai ki a maatau mo te whakatakoto moni →

taxInfo.heading: Taake-tango Hoatu
taxInfo.description: Ko te Orbital Temple he kaupapa tautoko moni a The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , he whakahaere kore-painga 501(c)(3) . Ko nga takoha katoa a te US he taake-tangohia ki te whānuitanga e whakaaetia ana e te ture.
taxInfo.questions: Nga patai? Whakapaa mai ki a matou i gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art
